"Danger Underfoot":
"Dude, I thought I was a goner! I got all cocky, thinking
I could brave the deepest depths of the Cauldron. But,
whoa, I couldn't have been more wrong. I mean, this
dragon with rocks growing out of its head suddenly
came flying out of the ground!
What's up with that?! It had ears that looked like fins
or something. I think it was one of those Caterdrans.
Talk about an unfair fight! I should get a medal for
making it back alive. But if you know how to take
one down, please feel free to show me!"

"危なかったぁー……
つい調子に乗って火山洞窟の奥へ
入り込んじゃって、えらい目に遭ったよ。
頭にゴツゴツ岩が生えてるドラゴンが
地面から飛び出してきたんだぜ！
耳がヒレみたいになってるヤツだよ。
キャタドランっていうのか？
ありゃ反則だよ。無事に逃げ帰っただけでも
褒めてもらいたいくらいだぜ。
もし倒し方があるなら教えてくれよ！"
